short_summary: Girl's Hygiene Products Dispensers are required for delivery. Description can be found on procurement Link.
description: Girls' hygiene products are needed. Use procurement Link for detailed vie of req.
full_summary:
## Tender Announcement: Feminine Hygiene Product Dispensers

### Publication Information

* **Publication Date**: December 4, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 20, 2023 at 2:00 PM (EST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: January 26, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: February 13, 2024

### Solicitation Information

* **Title**: Feminine Hygiene Product Dispensers
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4332805902
* **Amendment Number**: 6 (issued on December 14, 2023)

### Procurement Details

* **Goods and Services**: The requirement is to supply and deliver Feminine Hygiene Dispenser Units for the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).
* **Classification**: UNSPSC codes 44120000 (Office Supplies), 53131615 (Feminine Hygiene Products), and 72100000 (Building and Facility Maintenance and Repair Services).

### Tender Information

* **Method of Tendering**: Competitive Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: No trade agreements apply to this tender.

### Contracting Entity Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Lisa Hampel (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: lisa.hampel@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Documents

* **Tender Documents**: The solicitation documents are available on the Ariba Discovery platform at [https://service.ariba.com/Discovery.aw/ad/viewRFX?id=18182117](https://service.ariba.com/Discovery.aw/ad/viewRFX?id=18182117)

Note: The tender has already expired on the original announced closing date. If you would like to express interest in this opportunity, please contact the contracting entity for more information.inkleloses(@ Administrator/rewrite( **Tender Announcement: Feminine Hygiene Product Dispensers**
